title: Radisson Hotel Group unveils Uday Palace Navsari in Gujarat
description: Radisson Hotel Group has announced the opening of Uday Palace Navsari in Gujarat, a member of Radisson Individuals. The palace, located within a one-hour drive from Surat airport and a 20-minute journey from Navsari railway station, combines palace-style architecture with modern amenities.
